## Load the packages

```{r}
source("00_setup.R")
```

## load the Data

```{r}
unfaelle <- jsonlite::fromJSON("geodata/unfaelle_geo.json", flatten = TRUE) # %>% unnest()

unfaelle <- unfaelle$features %>% st_as_sf(crs = 4326, coords = c("coordinates.lat", "coordinates.lon"))
```

## Calculate Buffer

```{r}
unfaelle_buffer <- unfaelle %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 3857) %>%
  st_buffer(dist = 25) %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 4326) %>% 
  st_union()
```

## Preview

```{r fig.width=10}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = berlin_sf) +
  geom_sf(data = berlin_bezirke_sf, fill = "lightgrey") +
  geom_sf(data = unfaelle_buffer, color = "red", alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_void()
```
